name: Colonial Outlaw Triple Ollie Reverse No Scope War Apologetics Accent Grade S+
name_original: Colonial Outlaw Triple Ollie Reverse No Scope War Apologetics Accent Grade S+
description:
This isn't a game about the War on Terror.  This is a game about necromancy.


306,000 civilians died in the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan.

SKATE to bring that figure down to 0!

Do tricks like hanging upside down, flipping, and grinding!  

Each trick lowers the death count!

Games as activism!!

Works best on Chrome.  Mobile version found here.

---
